title: Essence reaver changes
body: Give essence reaver grevious wounds need AD item with it and it feels lackluster

replies.body:
Essence Reaver is amazing, but only on select champions.
Like AD Lulu.
And umm...
Umm...
Yeah, AD Lulu!
Also... umm...
A lot of ADCs when on Howling Abyss because wtf no Bloodthirster.

Yeah, it does suck.
I would rather they bring back atmas, and add grevious wounds to that.
